ihatha dina darshanayata amatharawa warthamanaye jathyantharaya pilipadina suryaya mulika karagath dina 365 ka surya dina darshanaya da owunge bhawithaye pawathi athara eeta amatharawa sikuru grahaya padanam karagath dina 584 ka darshanayak da angaharu grahaya padanam karagath dina 780 ka dina darshanayak da owunge bhawithaye pawathunu bawata thorathuru anawarnaya karagena atha.
eeta amatharawa pasugiya mahamathiwaranayedi champika ranawakage mathiwarana wyaparayata nayakathwaya dunneda maithri gunarathnaya.
ihala rajya niladharinge kakul wewulayi.

othana thamayi kattiyama waradda gaththe.
